item.title: How to Logging UTF-8 String for Apache HTTP Client?
item.description: When I read the logs from Apache HTTP Client, I found the Japanese / Korean words cannot be display, instead, there only some words like “[0x8a][0x7b][0x6c]â€¦”. The log data is very important, we are not allow any unreadable data in the log, otherwise the logs gonna be useless. From the log infomation, we find the Apache HTTP Client logs the logs at Wire:72, then I go to the source, the code is below:
